org.apache.hadoop.hbase.io.hfile

类 BlockCacheUtil.CachedBlocksByFile

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.hadoop.hbase.io.hfile.BlockCacheUtil.CachedBlocksByFile
  • 封闭类:
    BlockCacheUtil

    public static class BlockCacheUtil.CachedBlocksByFile
extends Object
    Use one of these to keep a running account of cached blocks by file. Throw it away when done. This is different than metrics in that it is stats on current state of a cache. See getLoadedCachedBlocksByFile

      • update

        public boolean update(CachedBlock cb)
        参数:
        cb -
        返回:
        True if full.... if we won't be adding any more.

      • isFull

        public boolean isFull()
        返回:
        True if full; i.e. there are more items in the cache but we only loaded up the maximum set in configuration hbase.ui.blockcache.by.file.max (Default: DEFAULT_MAX).
